Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class DesktopInput

Attached to a player object in hierarchy. DesktopInput receives input data through InputActions and converts them into Commands. Commands are then sent forward and processed or discarded depending on the target object. Use VRInput for VR functionality.

Inheritance

UnityEngine.Object
